akn:section.akn:heading: Enhanced geothermal systems research and development

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary shall support a program of research, development, demonstration, and commercial application for enhanced geothermal systems, including the programs described in subsection (b).

(b) Enhanced geothermal systems technologies In collaboration with industry partners, institutions of higher education, and the national laboratories, the Secretary shall support a program of research, development, demonstration, and commercial application of the technologies to achieve higher efficiency and lower cost enhanced geothermal systems, including—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Frontier observatory for research in geothermal energy

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Frontier observatory for research in geothermal energy
